title: "Stanford researchers propose AI in-home system that can monitor for coronavirus symptoms"
excerpt: "During the “COVID-19 and AI” livestream event run by the Stanford Institute of Human-Centered AI (HAI), Stanford professor and HAI codirector Dr. Fei-Fei Li presented a concept for an AI-powered in-home system that could track a resident’s health, including for signs of COVID-19, while ensuring privacy. It’s designed to keep seniors ..."
